description: PEAC error codes - normative source of truth

errors.title: Invalid Signature
errors.description: Receipt signature verification failed

errors.title: Invalid Format
errors.description: Receipt does not conform to JWS format

errors.title: Receipt Expired
errors.description: Receipt has exceeded its expiration time

errors.title: Not Yet Valid
errors.description: Receipt nbf (not before) time is in the future

errors.title: Invalid Issuer
errors.description: Receipt issuer claim is invalid or untrusted

errors.title: Invalid Audience
errors.description: Receipt audience claim does not match expected value

errors.title: JWKS Fetch Failed
errors.description: Failed to fetch public keys from JWKS endpoint

errors.title: Key Not Found
errors.description: Public key with specified kid not found in JWKS

errors.title: Invalid Amount
errors.description: Payment amount is invalid or out of allowed range

errors.title: Invalid Currency
errors.description: Currency code is not a valid ISO 4217 code

errors.title: Invalid Payment Rail
errors.description: Payment rail identifier is not recognized

errors.title: Missing Required Claim
errors.description: Receipt is missing a required JWT claim

errors.title: Rate Limited
errors.description: Too many requests, please retry later

errors.title: Circuit Breaker Open
errors.description: Service temporarily unavailable due to circuit breaker

errors.title: Control Decision Denied
errors.description: Control engine denied authorization

errors.title: Review Required
errors.description: Control engine requires manual review

errors.title: Evidence Not JSON-Safe
errors.description: Evidence contains non-JSON-safe values (NaN, Infinity, undefined, BigInt, Date, Map, Set, functions, symbols, class instances, or cycles)

errors.title: Invalid Subject
errors.description: Receipt subject claim does not match expected value

errors.title: Invalid Receipt ID
errors.description: Receipt ID (rid) does not match expected value

errors.title: Missing Expiration
errors.description: Receipt is missing required exp claim

errors.title: Internal Error
errors.description: An unexpected internal error occurred during verification

errors.title: Identity Missing
errors.description: No agent identity attestation provided in request

errors.title: Identity Invalid Format
errors.description: Agent identity attestation does not conform to schema

errors.title: Identity Expired
errors.description: Agent identity attestation has exceeded its expiration time

errors.title: Identity Not Yet Valid
errors.description: Agent identity attestation issued_at time is in the future

errors.title: Identity Signature Invalid
errors.description: Agent identity proof signature verification failed

errors.title: Identity Key Unknown
errors.description: Key ID not found in agent key directory

errors.title: Identity Key Expired
errors.description: Agent signing key has expired per directory metadata

errors.title: Identity Key Revoked
errors.description: Agent signing key has been explicitly revoked

errors.title: Identity Binding Mismatch
errors.description: Identity binding does not match the request being verified

errors.title: Identity Binding Stale
errors.description: Identity binding is too old and requires fresh binding

errors.title: Identity Binding Future
errors.description: Identity binding signed_at timestamp is in the future

errors.title: Identity Proof Unsupported
errors.description: Agent identity proof method is not supported

errors.title: Identity Directory Unavailable
errors.description: Failed to fetch agent key directory

errors.title: Attribution Missing Sources
errors.description: Attribution attestation has empty sources array

errors.title: Attribution Invalid Format
errors.description: Attribution attestation does not conform to schema

errors.title: Attribution Invalid Reference
errors.description: Receipt reference format is invalid (must be jti:{id}, URL, or URN)

errors.title: Attribution Hash Invalid
errors.description: Content hash structure is invalid (wrong algorithm, encoding, or value length)

errors.title: Attribution Unknown Usage
errors.description: Attribution usage type is not recognized

errors.title: Attribution Invalid Weight
errors.description: Attribution weight is out of valid range (must be 0.0-1.0)

errors.title: Attribution Circular Chain
errors.description: Circular reference detected in attribution chain

errors.title: Attribution Chain Too Deep
errors.description: Attribution chain exceeds maximum allowed depth (8)

errors.title: Attribution Too Many Sources
errors.description: Attribution has too many sources (maximum 100)

errors.title: Attribution Size Exceeded
errors.description: Attribution attestation exceeds maximum size (64KB)

errors.title: Attribution Resolution Failed
errors.description: Failed to resolve receipt reference in attribution chain

errors.title: Attribution Resolution Timeout
errors.description: Timeout while resolving receipt reference in attribution chain

errors.title: Attribution Not Yet Valid
errors.description: Attribution attestation issued_at time is in the future

errors.title: Attribution Expired
errors.description: Attribution attestation has exceeded its expiration time

errors.title: Dispute Invalid Format
errors.description: Dispute attestation does not conform to schema

errors.title: Dispute Invalid ID
errors.description: Dispute ID is not a valid ULID format (26 uppercase alphanumeric characters)

errors.title: Dispute Invalid Type
errors.description: Dispute type is not recognized

errors.title: Dispute Invalid Target Type
errors.description: Dispute target type is not recognized (must be receipt, attribution, identity, or policy)

errors.title: Dispute Invalid Grounds
errors.description: Dispute grounds code is not recognized

errors.title: Dispute Invalid State
errors.description: Dispute state is not recognized

errors.title: Dispute Invalid Transition
errors.description: Invalid state transition for dispute lifecycle

errors.title: Dispute Missing Resolution
errors.description: Resolution is required for terminal states (resolved, rejected, final)

errors.title: Dispute Resolution Not Allowed
errors.description: Resolution is only valid for terminal states

errors.title: Dispute Not Yet Valid
errors.description: Dispute attestation issued_at time is in the future

errors.title: Dispute Expired
errors.description: Dispute attestation has exceeded its expiration time

errors.title: Dispute Other Requires Description
errors.description: Dispute type 'other' requires description of at least 50 characters

errors.title: Dispute Duplicate
errors.description: A dispute with this ID already exists

errors.title: Dispute Target Not Found
errors.description: The target receipt, attribution, or identity being disputed was not found

errors.title: Bundle Invalid Format
errors.description: Bundle archive structure is invalid (not a valid ZIP or missing required files)

errors.title: Bundle Manifest Missing
errors.description: manifest.json not found at bundle archive root

errors.title: Bundle Manifest Invalid
errors.description: manifest.json does not conform to schema or contains invalid values

errors.title: Bundle Hash Mismatch
errors.description: File hash does not match value declared in manifest.json

errors.title: Bundle Signature Invalid
errors.description: bundle.sig JWS verification failed over manifest hash

errors.title: Bundle Receipts Unordered
errors.description: receipts.ndjson is not in deterministic order (issued_at, receipt_id, receipt_hash)

errors.title: Bundle Policy Hash Mismatch
errors.description: Policy snapshot hash does not match policy used to evaluate receipts

errors.title: Bundle Key Missing
errors.description: Required signing key not found in bundle (offline verification mode)

errors.title: Bundle Time Range Invalid
errors.description: Receipt issued_at is outside the bundle declared time_range

errors.title: Bundle Missing Receipts
errors.description: No receipts provided when creating bundle

errors.title: Bundle Missing Keys
errors.description: No verification keys provided in bundle JWKS

errors.title: Bundle Receipt Invalid
errors.description: Receipt JWS in bundle is malformed or missing required claims

errors.title: Bundle Duplicate Receipt
errors.description: Bundle contains multiple receipts with the same ID

errors.title: Bundle Path Traversal
errors.description: Bundle contains path traversal attack (zip-slip vulnerability)

errors.title: Bundle Size Exceeded
errors.description: Bundle exceeds size limits (entry count, entry size, or total size)

errors.title: UCP Signature Missing
errors.description: Request-Signature header is missing from UCP webhook request

errors.title: UCP Signature Malformed
errors.description: Request-Signature header is not a valid detached JWS (RFC 7797)

errors.title: UCP Signature Algorithm Unsupported
errors.description: Signature algorithm is not ES256, ES384, or ES512

errors.title: UCP Signature b64 Invalid
errors.description: b64=false requires 'b64' in 'crit' array per RFC 7797

errors.title: UCP Key Not Found
errors.description: Key ID from signature not found in business UCP profile

errors.title: UCP Key Algorithm Mismatch
errors.description: Key type is not EC as required for ECDSA signatures

errors.title: UCP Key Curve Mismatch
errors.description: Key curve does not match signature algorithm (ES256=P-256, ES384=P-384, ES512=P-521)

errors.title: UCP Signature Invalid
errors.description: Webhook signature verification failed against payload

errors.title: UCP Verification Failed
errors.description: All verification attempts failed (raw and JCS canonicalized)

errors.title: UCP Profile Fetch Failed
errors.description: Failed to fetch business UCP profile from /.well-known/ucp

errors.title: UCP Profile Invalid
errors.description: Business UCP profile does not conform to expected schema

errors.title: UCP Profile No Signing Keys
errors.description: Business UCP profile has empty or missing signing_keys array

errors.title: UCP Payload Empty
errors.description: Webhook request body is empty

errors.title: UCP Payload Not JSON
errors.description: Webhook request body is not valid JSON

errors.title: UCP Payload Too Large
errors.description: Webhook request body exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.title: UCP Order Invalid
errors.description: UCP order object does not conform to expected schema

errors.title: UCP Order Missing ID
errors.description: UCP order is missing required id field

errors.title: UCP Order Missing Line Items
errors.description: UCP order is missing required line_items array

errors.title: UCP Order Missing Totals
errors.description: UCP order is missing required totals array or total entry

errors.title: UCP Evidence Serialization Failed
errors.description: Failed to serialize UCP evidence to YAML format
